question: Identify the correct sequence of action potential as it arrives at the axon terminal from the choices given below:
choices: Axon terminal → Synaptic cleft → Synaptic vesicles → Post-synaptic neuron → Post-synaptic membrane
Axon terminal → Post-synaptic membrane → Synaptic cleft → Synaptic vesicles → Post-synaptic neuron
Axon terminal → Synaptic vesicles → Post-synaptic membrane → Synaptic cleft → Post-synaptic neuron
Axon terminal → Synaptic vesicles → Synaptic cleft → Post-synaptic membrane → Post-synaptic neuron
explanation: The sequence is: Axon terminal depolarizes → Synaptic vesicles fuse with membrane → Neurotransmitter released into Synaptic cleft → Binds to receptors on Post-synaptic membrane → Potential in Post-synaptic neuron.
